  physical_appearance: This is a pair of doorway hangings or todaliyan. They are \u0027L\u0027 shaped
 featuring cotton weave with embroidery work. The hangings have a multicoloured fringe border. They are decorated with stylized embroidery of foliage
 birds
 animals
 and deities. There is a sewn-on inscription on the bottom left hanging. The decorations are bordered by a scrolling floral pattern.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a pair of doorway hangings or todaliyan. They are 'L' shaped, featuring cotton weave with embroidery work. The hangings have a multicoloured fringe border. They are decorated with stylized embroidery of foliage, birds, animals, and deities. There is a sewn-on inscription on the bottom left hanging. The decorations are bordered by a scrolling floral pattern.
